fullName.jp: セシル・ハーヴィ（パラディン）

description.jp: 元は軍事国家バロンに仕える「暗黒騎士」だったが 闇の力で戦う己の生き方に疑問を抱いた末に聖なる騎士「パラディン」に転身。真実を見据える強い精神力と 仲間たちとの絆を武器に苦難を乗り越え 宿敵ゴルベーザとその背後の真実に立ち向かった。
description.gl: At one time a dark knight of Baron, Cecil questions his way of life and becomes a paladin. With steel nerves fixed on the truth and the bonds with his allies as his weapons, he overcomes many trials to face his archenemy Golbez and what lies beyond.

jp.text: わからないのか？\n僕だ！セシルだ！
負けるわけには いかない！
揺るぎない想い この剣に誓う
暗黒の力を\n聖なる祈りに！

gl.text: Do you not know me!? It is I—Cecil!
This is the end for you—not us!
I swear on this blade—I will not be dissuaded!
I can turn darkness into hallowed light!

name.gl: コールアビリティ_セシルパラディン
name.jp: コールアビリティ_セシルパラディン

rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Holy Flame (C):
 • Slight boost to BRV increased based on MAX BRV
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 • Special effect duration +3 after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ホーリーフレイム【C】」使用時
・最大BRV依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・使用後特殊効果の3ACTION期間延長

name.gl: LDコールアビリティ_セシルパラディン
name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_セシルパラディン

rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Luminous Shard (C):
 • 8-hit group Holy  ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack becomes 3-hit group Holy  ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack + 5-hit group Holy  ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
 • Moderately increases BRV damage dealt when attacking target's weakness
 • Holy  Resist Down duration +2
 • Slight boost to HP recovery in excess of MAX HP from special effect after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ライトスラスター【C】」使用時
・8HIT聖属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　3HIT聖属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　＋5HIT聖属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃に変化
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの200％分
・弱点をついた時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
・「聖耐性ダウン」の2ACTION期間延長
・使用後特殊効果の
　最大HPを超えてHP回復する効果小アップ

desc.gl:
8-hit group Holy ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Tremendously restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 60% of individual MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
All targets: 4 turns Holy Resist Down
Self: 6 turns special effect Crystal Entrusted
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)

While special effect Crystal Entrusted active:
 • Tremendously raises party's DEF
 • Grants party HP Regen effect
 • Party's HP may be recovered in excess of individual MAX HP by 30%
 • Reduces HP damage taken of party members with at least 100% HP
 • Moderately increases BRV damage dealt, slightly increases HP damage dealt of party members with at least 100% HP
 • Does not stack with special effects of same name

8HIT聖属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃

回復量の上限は それぞれの最大HPの60％分
